ticket.title: Capability Proof Model and Event Definitions

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Capability event types documented in RFC

implementation.summary:
Define capability event types and proof model, including namespace
binding and delegation chain requirements. Map to existing lease system.

notes:
Phase: P1.5
Generated from RFC RFC-0014 ticket decomposition on 2026-01-28.

test_requirements.verification_command: cargo run --bin apm2 -- factory tickets emit --rfc RFC-0014
